languages.text: "Род Чорда запятнан, но не деяниями одной лишь пиратки Аспис. Все вы, ее наследники, также были скверны — дурное семя, взрощенное в ее мрачной тени. Вы были алчными, самолюбивыми, забывшими законы и заветы Императора... Когда Аспис исчезла, ее место занял бы один из вас, но вы были бы не лучше ее. Потому я прополол поле".

"House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."
languages.original_text: "Род Чорда запятнан, но не деяниями одной лишь пиратки Аспис. Все вы, ее наследники, также были скверны — дурное семя, взрощенное в ее мрачной тени. Вы были алчными, самолюбивыми, забывшими законы и заветы Императора... Когда Аспис исчезла, ее место занял бы один из вас, но вы были бы не лучше ее. Потому я прополол поле".

And so I weeded the field."

languages.text: “库尔达家族自甘堕落，但这并不是阿斯拜丝一个人造成的结果。你们所有人，她所有的继承人，都堕入了邪道。在她邪恶的阴影之下，你们这些卑劣的种子生根发芽。你们所有人都贪婪、自负，你们早就忘记了帝皇的法律与戒律……阿斯拜丝失踪之后，你们其中一人将会接替她的位置，但你们并不会比她做得更好。于是，我就除掉了那些毒草。”
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: “库尔达家族自甘堕落，但这并不是阿斯拜丝一个人造成的结果。你们所有人，她所有的继承人，都堕入了写道。在她邪恶的阴影之下，你们这些卑劣的种子生根发芽。你们所有人都贪婪、自负，你们早就忘记了帝皇的法律与戒律……阿斯拜丝失踪之后，你们其中一人将会接替她的位置，但你们并不会比她做得更好。于是，我就除掉了那些毒草。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「チョーダ家は自分自身で、一家を色褪せたものにした。決して海賊アスパイスだけの責任ではない。お前たち全員、後継者全員が、腐敗していたからだ。まるで一家の厳しい影に芽生えた、悪い種の様に。お前たちは全員、貪欲で自己中心的だった。皇帝の法や指揮も忘れていた。アスパイスが姿を消した後、お前たちの誰かが彼女の後継者になるはずだったが、彼女を超越する者はいなかった。だから私が、雑草を除去してやった」
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ家は自分自身で、一家を色褪せたものにした。決して海賊アスパイスだけの責任ではない。お前たち全員、後継者全員が、腐敗していたからだ。まるで一家の厳しい影に芽生えた、悪い種の様に。お前たちは全員、貪欲で自己中心的だった。皇帝の法や指揮も忘れていた。アスパイスが姿を消した後、お前たちの誰かが彼女の後継者になるはずだったが、彼女を超越する者はいなかった。だから私が、雑草を除去してやった」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «La reputación de la casa Chorda se ha visto mancillada, pero no solo no solo por los actos de la pirata Aspyce. Sus herederos también estabais corruptos. La semilla mala que brotó a su sombría sombra. Habéis olvidado las leyes y mandamientos del Emperador... Tras la desaparición de Aspyce, uno de vosotros iba a ocupar su lugar, pero no habríais sido mejor que ella, así que acabé con todo».
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: «La reputación de la casa Chorda se ha visto mancillada, pero no solo no solo por los actos de la pirata Aspyce. Sus herederos también estabais corruptos. La semilla mala que brotó a su sombría sombra. Habéis olvidado las leyes y mandamientos del Emperador... Tras la desaparición de Aspyce, uno de vosotros iba a ocupar su lugar, pero no habríais sido mejor que ella, así que acabé con todo».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Haus Chorda hat sich besudelt, allerdings nicht allein durch die Taten der Piratin Aspyce. Auch Ihr alle, ihre Erben, wart korrupt. Die faule Saat, die in ihrem düsteren Schatten sprießen konnte. Ihr wart gierig und egoistisch. Ihr hattet die Gesetze und Gebote des Imperators vergessen ... Nachdem Aspyce verschwunden war, hätte einer von Euch ihren Platz einnehmen sollen, doch Ihr wäret keinen Deut besser gewesen als sie. Daher habe ich das Unkraut aus dem Feld gejätet."
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Chorda hat sich besudelt, allerdings nicht allein durch die Taten der Piratin Aspyce. Auch Ihr alle, ihre Erben, wart korrupt. Die faule Saat, die in ihrem düsteren Schatten sprießen konnte. Ihr wart gierig und egoistisch. Ihr hattet die Gesetze und Gebote des Imperators vergessen ... Nachdem Aspyce verschwunden war, hätte einer von Euch ihren Platz einnehmen sollen, doch Ihr wäret keinen Deut besser gewesen als sie. Daher habe ich das Unkraut aus dem Feld gejätet."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « La maison Chorda s'était souillée, mais pas seulement à cause des crimes d'Aspyce. Ses héritiers, vous y comprise, étaient tout aussi corrompus, comme de mauvaises graines poussant dans l'ombre sinistre de votre dirigeante. Vous étiez tous cupides et égoïstes, vous aviez oublié les lois et les commandements de l'Empereur... Après la disparition d'Aspyce, l'un de vous allait prendre sa place, mais aucun de vous ne valait mieux qu'elle. Voilà pourquoi j'ai décidé d'agir. »
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Chorda s'était souillée, mais pas seulement à cause des crimes d'Aspyce. Ses héritiers, vous y comprise, étaient tout aussi corrompus, comme de mauvaises graines poussant dans l'ombre sinistre de votre dirigeante. Vous étiez tous cupides et égoïstes, vous aviez oublié les lois et les commandements de l'Empereur... Après la disparition d'Aspyce, l'un de vous allait prendre sa place, mais aucun de vous ne valait mieux qu'elle. Voilà pourquoi j'ai décidé d'agir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Chorda Hanesi kendi kendisini lekelemişti. Bu leke, Aspyce'nin korsan olarak yaptıklarından ibaret değildi. Onun vârisleri olarak hepiniz, onun zalim gölgesinde filizlenen kötülük tohumu yüzünden yozlaşmıştınız. Açgözlü ve bencildiniz. İmparator'un kanunlarını ve emirlerini unutmuştunuz. Aspyce yok olduktan sonra onun yerini içinizden biri alacaktı ve ondan daha iyi olmayacaktınız. Bu nedenle de yabani otları yoldum."
languages.original_text: "House Chorda had tarnished itself, but not by the deeds of the pirate Aspyce alone. All of you, her heirs, were corrupt too: the bad seed that sprouted in her grim shadow. You were greedy and egotistical. You had forgotten the Emperor's laws and commandments... After Aspyce disappeared, one of you was going to take her place, but you would have been no better than her. And so I weeded the field."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda Hanesi kendi kendisini lekelemişti ve bunun tek sebebi, Aspyce'nin korsan olarak yaptıkları da değildi. Onun tüm vârisleri, hepiniz, onun zalim gölgesinde filizlenen kötülük tohumu nedeniyle yozlaşmıştınız. Açgözlü ve egoisttiniz. İmparator'un kanunlarını ve emirlerini unutmuştunuz. Aspyce yok olduktan sonra onun yerini içinizden biri alacaktı ve ondan daha iyi olmayacaktınız. Bu nedenle de yabani otları yoldum."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
